https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/sJDh5H5q4xSodAsNeE9CffS3032.jpg A documentary that focuses on Abbas Kiarostami's cinematic philosophy talking to himself and other figures, and also seeks the opinion about his works both inside and outside his homeland. Close to Kiarostami
